QuestData.Title: Declawing The Competition
QuestData.Description: These saberon freaks have cost me a lot of money, $c.$b$bI'm not one to forgive a debt and it's time to collect!$b$bThe saberon that have been causing us the most trouble are the ones living in Sabermaw. They keep ambushing our trade shipments along the road.$b$b<Pyxni grins.>$b$bIt's time to declaw the competition. Bring me their claws; we'll sell the best ones as good luck charms here at the arena.$b$bIf the claw sales don't cover their debt, we'll just have to charge them an arm and a leg too!
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the saberon claws I asked for?
QuestData.RewardText: <Pyxni examines the saberon claws.>$b$bWe're gonna make a killing selling these as good luck charms to all the wannabe gladiators here at the arena!$b$bFrom now on, the saberon will think twice about messing with the Steamwheedle Cartel!
